lead_paragraph: The New York State inspector general cited financial mismanagement and poor oversight in its first formal review of the university system.

headline.print_headline: Poor Oversight Made CUNY Finances ‘Ripe for Abuse,’ State Inspector General Finds
headline.main: Lapses by CUNY Officials Made System ‘Ripe for Abuse,’ Report Says

snippet: The New York State inspector general cited financial mismanagement and poor oversight in its first formal review of the university system....
abstract: Report conducted by New York State inspector general's office finds poor oversight and management at City University of New York has allowed financial abuses that have negatively impacted students and campus projects in need of funding; former university president Lisa S Coico is one of several people, or entities, affiliated with CUNY who are now under investigation.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Brooklyn College, City University of New York
